content.Affiliate_Cosmetic_Main_Descript.en-GB: {[community_name]} is hosting a {[availability_name]} for the coveted **{[reward_items]}**! You can view more details by [joining]({[community_invite]}) their community.
content.Affiliate_Cosmetic_Main_Descript.es-ES: ¡{[community_name]} esta hosteando un {[availability_name]} para los codiciados **{[reward_items]}**! Puedes ver más detalles [entrando]({[community_invite]}) en su comunidad.
content.Affiliate_Cosmetic_Main_Descript.hu: {[community_name]} egy {[availablity_name]}-t hostol az ahitott **{[reward_items]}-ert**! Tovar i reszletekert reszletek [csatlakozz]({[community_invite]}) a kozossegukhoz.
content.Affiliate_Cosmetic_Main_Descript.ko: {[community_name]}이(가) **{[reward_items]}**에 대한 {[availability_name]}을(를) 주최하고 있습니다! 더 많은 세부 사항은 해당 커뮤니티에 [참가]({[community_invite]})하여 확인할 수 있습니다.

content.Boost_Event_Main_Description.en-GB: Assemble your crew and get ready to set sail — {[main_event_name]} is now live! You'll gain boosted reputation and gold for any activities related to {[boost_faction]}!
content.Boost_Event_Main_Description.ko: 크루를 모아서 출항 준비를 하세요 - {[main_event_name]}이(가) 시작되었습니다! {[boost_faction]}에 관련된 모든 활동에서 평판 및 골드가 증가합니다!

content.Capture_a_Code_Main_Description.en-GB: Deckhand Lootin' Lizalaroo is back with another Capture a Code competition on the forums! Snap a shot of **'{[event_theme]}'** and you'll have a chance to earn a variety of exclusive cosmetics.
content.Capture_a_Code_Main_Description.ko: 갑판장 Lootin' Lizalaroo가 포럼에서 또 다른 코드 캡처 대회를 시작했습니다! **'{[event_theme]}'**의 스크린샷을 찍고 다양한 독점 코스메틱을 받을 기회를 얻으세요.

content.Community_Event_Main_Description.en-GB: Raise your tankards and get ready for another community celebration! You can enjoy a boost on gold, reputation, renown, and [more]({[sot_article_url]})!
content.Community_Event_Main_Description.ko: 탱커드를 들고 또 다른 커뮤니티 축제를 준비하세요! 골드, 평판, 명성 등 [더 많은]({[sot_article_url]}) 혜택을 즐기세요!

content.Gold_Rush_Main_Description.en-GB: Gold Rush is now active until <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:t>, <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:R>! All loot cashed in will enjoy a 1.5x multiplier — so grab that gold!
content.Gold_Rush_Main_Description.ko: 골드 러시는<t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:t>, **<t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:R>**까지 진행됩니다! 판매한 모든 전리품은 1.5배 보너스가 적용됩니다. - 골드를 모을 절호의 기회를 놓치지 마세요!

content.Gold_Twitch_Drop_Main_Descriptio.en-GB: Tune in and watch [{[availability_name]}]({[availability_link]}) to earn {[gold_drop_amount_thousands]}k gold! Remember to [link]({[twitch_connection_url]}) your Twitch account to Sea of Thieves and claim the gold once it's unlocked!
content.Gold_Twitch_Drop_Main_Descriptio.ko: [{[availability_name]}]({[availability_link]})을(를) 시청하고 {[gold_drop_amount_thousands]}k 골드를 얻으세요! Twitch 계정을 Sea of Thieves에 [연결]({[twitch_connection_url]})하고 골드가 잠금 해제되면 보상받는 것을 잊지 마세요!

content.Gold_and_Glory_Main_Description.en-GB: Call your crew and throw a Voyage on the table — a new Gold & Glory Weekend is now live! You'll gain boosted reputation, gold, renown, and allegiance for all your high-sea hijinks!
content.Gold_and_Glory_Main_Description.ko: 크루를 불러서 항해를 테이블 위에 올려놓으세요. - 새로운 골드 & 글로리 주말이 시작되었습니다! 모든 멀티플레이어 해역에서 골드, 평판, 명성, 충성도가 증가합니다!

content.Insider_Rewards_Reminder_Descrip.en-GB: The current Insider week ends <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:R>! Make sure to earn enough reputation before <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:F>.

content.Partner_Cosmetic_Main_Descriptio.en-GB: {[partner_name]} is hosting a {[availability_name]} for the exclusive {[reward_items]}! You can view more details by checking out their [channel]({[partner_page]}).
content.Partner_Cosmetic_Main_Descriptio.ko: {[partner_name]}이(가) 독점 **{[reward_items]}**에 대한 {[availability_name]}을(를) 주최하고 있습니다! 더 많은 세부 사항은 해당 [채널]({[partner_page]})에서 확인할 수 있습니다.

content.Regular_Twitch_Drop_Main_Descrip.en-GB: Tune in and watch [{[availability_name]}]({[availability_link]}) for a total of **{[rewards_count]} hours** to earn all drops! Remember to link your Twitch account to Sea of Thieves and claim your drop once it's unlocked!
content.Regular_Twitch_Drop_Main_Descrip.ko: [{[availability_name]}]({[availability_link]})을(를) 시청하고 **{[rewards_count]} 시간** 동안 추가로 시청하여 모든 드롭스를 획득하세요! Twitch 계정을 Sea of Thieves에 연결하고 드롭스가 잠금 해제되면 수령하는 것을 잊지 마세요!

content.Special_Twitch_Drops_Main_Descri.en-GB: Tune in and watch [{[availability_name]}]({[availability_link]}) to earn **{[rewards_count]}** new drop items! Remember to link your Twitch account to Sea of Thieves and claim your drop once it's unlocked!
content.Special_Twitch_Drops_Main_Descri.ko: [{[availability_name]}]({[availability_link]})을(를) 시청하고 **{[rewards_count]}**개의 새로운 드롭스 아이템을 획득하세요! Twitch 계정을 Sea of Thieves에 연결하고 드롭스가 잠금 해제되면 수령하는 것을 잊지 마세요!

short.Any_Twitch_Drop_Host.ko: 참여 중인 Sea of Thieves 스트리머

short.Official_Twitch_Drop_Host.en-GB: the Official Sea of Thieves Channel

short.Partner_Twitch_Drop_Host.ko: 참여 중인 Sea of Thieves 파트너
